69 CalibrationManager::CalibrationManager(ros::NodeHandle &nh, std::vector<std::shared_ptr<JointState>> joint_list, std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface,
70  std::shared_ptr<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore> can_interface)
71  : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface)), _can_interface(std::move(can_interface)), _joint_states_list(std::move(joint_list))
72 {
73  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::ctor");
74 
75  // we need at least tlt_interface
76  assert(_ttl_interface);
77 
78  if (_can_interface)
79  _stepper_bus_interface = _can_interface;
80  else
81  _stepper_bus_interface = _ttl_interface;
82 
83  assert(_stepper_bus_interface);
84 
85  initParameters(nh);
86 
87  ROS_INFO("Calibration Interface - Calibration interface started");
88 }
89 
94 void CalibrationManager::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
95 {
96  nh.getParam("calibration_timeout", _calibration_timeout);
97 
98  nh.getParam("calibration_file", _calibration_file_name);
99  nh.getParam("homing_offset_file", _homing_offset_file_name);
100  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot_hardware_interface/hardware_version", _hardware_version);
101  nh.getParam("simulation_mode", _simulation_mode);
102 
103  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - hardware_version %s", _hardware_version.c_str());
104  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - Calibration timeout %d", _calibration_timeout);
105 
106  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - Calibration file name %s", _calibration_file_name.c_str());
107  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - Simulation mode %s", _simulation_mode ? "True" : "False");
108 
109  // get steppers specific params
110  for (int currentIdStepper = 1; nh.hasParam("calibration_params/stepper_" + std::to_string(currentIdStepper) + "/id"); ++currentIdStepper)
111  {
112  // first get id
113  std::string currentNamespace = "calibration_params/stepper_" + std::to_string(currentIdStepper);
114  int id{-1};
115  int stall_threshold{6};
116  int direction{1};
117  int delay{0};
118 
119  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/id", id);
120  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/stall_threshold", stall_threshold);
121  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/direction", direction);
122  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/delay", delay);
123 
124  // acceleration and velocity profiles (with conversion from RPM and RPM-2)
125  common::model::VelocityProfile profile{};
126  double data{};
127  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_start"))
128  {
129  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_start", data);
130  // v in 0.01 RPM
131  profile.v_start = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
132  }
133  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/a_1"))
134  {
135  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/a_1", data);
136  profile.a_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
137  }
138  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_1"))
139  {
140  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_1", data);
141  profile.v_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
142  }
143  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/a_max"))
144  {
145  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/a_max", data);
146  profile.a_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
147  }
148  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_max"))
149  {
150  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_max", data);
151  profile.v_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
152  }
153  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/d_max"))
154  {
155  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/d_max", data);
156  profile.d_max = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
157  }
158  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/d_1"))
159  {
160  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/d_1", data);
161  profile.d_1 = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_SQ_TO_RPM_SQ);
162  }
163  if (nh.hasParam(currentNamespace + "/v_stop"))
164  {
165  nh.getParam(currentNamespace + "/v_stop", data);
166  profile.v_stop = static_cast<uint32_t>(data * RADIAN_PER_SECONDS_TO_RPM * 100);
167  }
168 
169  // add parameters
170  CalibrationConfig conf{static_cast<uint8_t>(stall_threshold), static_cast<int8_t>(direction), delay, profile};
171 
172  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - stepper (id %d): stall threshold: %d, direction: %d, delay: %d", id, stall_threshold, direction, delay);
173 
174  ROS_DEBUG("Calibration Interface::initParameters - Calibration Profile: {%d, %d, %d, %d, %d, %d, %d, %d}", profile.v_start, profile.a_1, profile.v_1, profile.a_max,
175  profile.v_max, profile.d_max, profile.d_1, profile.v_stop);
176 
177  _calibration_params_map.insert(std::make_pair(static_cast<uint8_t>(id), conf));
178  }
179 }
180 
187 int CalibrationManager::startCalibration(int mode, std::string &result_message)
188 {
189  ROS_INFO("CalibrationManager::startCalibration : Starting calibration...");
190  int res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CALIBRATION_NOT_DONE;
191  result_message.clear();
192 
193  // if ttl connection is ok AND (can not present OR can connection ok)
194  if ((_ttl_interface && _ttl_interface->isConnectionOk()) && (_stepper_bus_interface && _stepper_bus_interface->isConnectionOk()))
195  {
196  if (AUTO_CALIBRATION == mode) // auto
197  {
198  if (EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK == autoCalibration())
199  {
200  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Calibration done";
201  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
202  }
203  else
204  result_message = "Calibration Interface - auto calibration failed";
205  }
206  else if (MANUAL_CALIBRATION == mode) // manuel
207  {
208  if (_hardware_version == "one")
209  {
210  if (canProcessManualCalibration(result_message))
211  {
212  if (EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK == manualCalibration())
213  {
214  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Calibration done";
215  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
220  result_message = "Calibration Interface - manual calibration failed";
221  }
222  }
223  }
224  else
225  {
226  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Command calibration manual on this plateform is not available";
227  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
228  }
229  }
230  else // unknown
231  {
232  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Command error";
233  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
234  }
235  }
236  else
237  {
238  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Please ensure that all motors are connected";
239  }
240 
241  ROS_ERROR_COND(niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != res, "Calibration Interface - Calibration error : %s", result_message.c_str());
242 
243  return res;
244 }
245 
246 int CalibrationManager::startFactoryCalibration(FactoryCalibration::Request::_command_type command, FactoryCalibration::Request::_ids_type ids, std::string &result_message)
247 {
248  ROS_INFO("CalibrationManager::startFactoryCalibration : Starting calibration...");
249  int res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CALIBRATION_NOT_DONE;
250 
251  // if ttl connection is ok AND (can not present OR can connection ok)
252  if ((_ttl_interface && _ttl_interface->isConnectionOk()) && (_stepper_bus_interface && _stepper_bus_interface->isConnectionOk()))
253  {
254  // Get all stepper joints ids
255  std::vector<int> stepper_ids{};
256  for (const auto &js : _joint_states_list)
257  {
258  if (js->isStepper())
259  {
260  stepper_ids.push_back(js->getId());
261  }
262  }
263 
264  // Set torque of steppers not being calibrated to off to help moving the joints freely for calibration
265  for (const auto &stepper_id : stepper_ids)
266  {
267  if (std::find(ids.begin(), ids.end(), stepper_id) == ids.end())
268  {
269  auto js = _stepper_bus_interface->getJointState(stepper_id);
270  if (command == FactoryCalibration::Request::START)
271  {
272  setTorqueStepperMotor(js, 0);
273  }
274  else {
275  setTorqueStepperMotor(js, js->getTorquePercentage());
276  }
277  }
278  }
279 
280  for (const auto &id : ids)
281  {
282  // Check if id is associated to stepper
283  if (std::find_if(_joint_states_list.begin(), _joint_states_list.end(), [id](const std::shared_ptr<common::model::JointState> joint_state)
284  {return joint_state->getId() == id && joint_state->isStepper();}) != _joint_states_list.end())
285  {
286  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_FACTORY_CALIBRATION, id, {command});
287  _stepper_bus_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
288  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
289  }
290  else
291  {
292  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Not calibratable joint ID: " + std::to_string(id);
293  res = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
294  break;
295  }
296  }
297  }
298  else
299  {
300  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Please ensure that all motors are connected";
301  }
302 
303  ROS_ERROR_COND(niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != res, "Calibration Interface - Calibration error : %s", result_message.c_str());
304 
305  return res;
306 }
307 
312 EStepperCalibrationStatus CalibrationManager::getCalibrationStatus() const
313 {
314  EStepperCalibrationStatus status{EStepperCalibrationStatus::FAIL};
315 
316  if (_stepper_bus_interface)
317  status = _stepper_bus_interface->getCalibrationStatus();
318 
319  return status;
320 }
321 
327 bool CalibrationManager::canProcessManualCalibration(std::string &result_message)
328 {
329  bool res = true;
330  result_message.clear();
331 
332  if (_stepper_bus_interface)
333  {
334  auto stepper_motor_states = _stepper_bus_interface->getJointStates();
335 
336  // 1. Check if motors firmware version is ok
337  for (auto const &mState : stepper_motor_states)
338  {
339  if (mState)
340  {
341  std::string firmware_version = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<StepperMotorState>(mState)->getFirmwareVersion();
342  if (!firmware_version.empty())
343  {
344  if (stoi(firmware_version.substr(0, 1)) >= 2)
345  {
346  // 2. Check if motor offset values have been previously saved (with auto calibration)
347  std::vector<int> motor_id_list;
348  std::vector<int> steps_list;
349 
350  if (readCalibrationOffsetsFromFile(motor_id_list, steps_list))
351  {
352  // 3. Check if all connected motors have a motor offset value
353 
354  bool found = false;
355 
356  for (auto const &m_id : motor_id_list)
357  {
358  if (m_id == mState->getId())
359  {
360  found = true;
361  break;
362  }
363  }
364 
365  if (!found)
366  {
367  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Motor " + std::to_string(mState->getId()) + " does not have a saved offset value, " +
368  "you need to do one auto calibration";
369 
370  res = false;
371  }
372  }
373  else
374  {
375  result_message = "Calibration Interface - You need to make an "
376  "auto calibration before using the manual calibration";
377 
378  res = false;
379  }
380  }
381  else
382  {
383  result_message = "Calibration Interface - You need to upgrade stepper firmware for motor " + std::to_string(mState->getId());
384 
385  res = false;
386  }
387  }
388  else
389  {
390  result_message = "Calibration Interface - No firmware version available for motor " + std::to_string(mState->getId()) + ". Make sure all motors are connected";
391 
392  res = false;
393  }
394  } // if (mState)
395  } // for (auto const& mState : stepper_motor_states)
396  }
397  else
398  {
399  result_message = "Calibration Interface - Steppers interface not available";
400 
401  res = false;
402  }
403 
404  ROS_ERROR_COND(!res, "Calibration Interface - Can't process manual calibration : %s", result_message.c_str());
405 
406  return res;
407 }
408 
413 EStepperCalibrationStatus CalibrationManager::autoCalibration()
414 {
415  // 0. Init velocity profile
416  initVelocityProfiles();
417  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - initVelocityProfiles");
418 
419  // 1. Place robot in position
420  moveRobotBeforeCalibration();
421  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - moveRobotBeforeCalibration");
422 
423  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version && readHomingAbsPositionFromFile())
424  {
425  writeHomingAbsPosition();
426  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - writeHomingAbsPosition");
427  }
428 
429  // 2. Send calibration cmd 1 + 2 + 3 (from can or ttl depending of which interface is instanciated)
430  sendCalibrationToSteppers();
431  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - sendCalibrationToSteppers");
432 
433  double timeout = 0.0;
434  // 3. wait for calibration status to change
435 
436  // get calibration result final
437  EStepperCalibrationStatus final_status = EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS;
438 
439  while (EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS == final_status)
440  {
441  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
442  timeout += 0.2;
443  if (timeout >= 30.0)
444  {
445  _stepper_bus_interface->resetCalibration();
446  ROS_ERROR("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - calibration timeout, please try again");
447  return common::model::EStepperCalibrationStatus::TIMEOUT;
448  }
449  final_status = getCalibrationStatus();
450  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - calibration status, %s", common::model::StepperCalibrationStatusEnum(final_status).toString().c_str());
451  }
452 
453  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
454 
455  // 4. retrieve values for the calibration
456  std::vector<int> sensor_offset_results;
457  std::vector<int> sensor_offset_ids;
458 
459  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
460  {
461  if (jState && jState->isStepper())
462  {
463  uint8_t motor_id = jState->getId();
464 
465  if (_stepper_bus_interface)
466  {
467  int calibration_result = _stepper_bus_interface->getCalibrationResult(motor_id);
468 
469  sensor_offset_results.emplace_back(calibration_result);
470  sensor_offset_ids.emplace_back(motor_id);
471 
472  ROS_INFO("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - Motor %d, calibration cmd result %d ", motor_id, calibration_result);
473  }
474  }
475  }
476 
477  if (EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK == final_status)
478  {
479  ROS_INFO("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - Calibration successfull, going back home");
480 
481  // 5. put back velocity profiles to normal
482  resetVelocityProfiles();
483  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - resetVelocityProfiles");
484 
485  // 6. Move steppers to home
486  moveSteppersToHome();
487  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - moveSteppersToHome");
488 
489  ros::Duration(("ned2" == _hardware_version) ? 3.5 : 4).sleep();
490 
491  // 7. Write sensor_offset_steps to file
492  saveCalibrationOffsetsToFile(sensor_offset_ids, sensor_offset_results);
493 
494  // 8. Write homing_abs_position to file
495  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version)
496  {
497  std::vector<uint8_t> homing_abs_position_ids;
498  std::vector<int32_t> homing_abs_position_results;
499 
500  readHomingAbsPosition();
501  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - readHomingAbsPosition");
502 
503  saveHomingAbsPositionToFile();
504  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - saveHomingAbsPositionToFile");
505  }
506  }
507  else
508  {
509  ROS_ERROR("CalibrationManager::autoCalibration - An error occurred while calibrating stepper motors");
510  }
511 
512  // 8 - activate torque for ned2, disactivate for ned1
513  activateTorque("ned2" == _hardware_version);
514 
515  return final_status;
516 }
517 
524 EStepperCalibrationStatus CalibrationManager::manualCalibration()
525 {
526  EStepperCalibrationStatus status = EStepperCalibrationStatus::FAIL;
527 
528  if (_stepper_bus_interface)
529  {
530  std::vector<int> motor_id_list;
531  std::vector<int> steps_list;
532 
533  if (readCalibrationOffsetsFromFile(motor_id_list, steps_list))
534  {
535  // 0. Torque ON for motor 2
536  auto state = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::StepperMotorState>(_joint_states_list.at(1));
537  if (state)
538  {
539  int steps_per_rev = state->stepsPerRev();
540 
541  for (size_t i = 0; i < motor_id_list.size(); i++)
542  {
543  int offset_to_send = 0;
544  int motor_id = motor_id_list.at(i);
545  int sensor_offset_steps = steps_list.at(i);
546 
547  if (motor_id == _joint_states_list.at(0)->getId())
548  {
549  offset_to_send = sensor_offset_steps - _joint_states_list.at(0)->to_motor_pos(_joint_states_list.at(0)->getLimitPositionMax()) % steps_per_rev;
550  if (offset_to_send < 0)
551  offset_to_send += steps_per_rev;
552 
553  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION_OFFSET, _joint_states_list.at(0)->getId(), {offset_to_send, offset_to_send});
554  _stepper_bus_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
555  }
556  else if (motor_id == _joint_states_list.at(1)->getId())
557  {
558  offset_to_send = sensor_offset_steps - _joint_states_list.at(1)->to_motor_pos(_joint_states_list.at(1)->getLimitPositionMax()) % steps_per_rev;
559  // offset_to_send %= steps_per_rev;
560  if (offset_to_send < 0)
561  offset_to_send += steps_per_rev;
562 
563  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION_OFFSET, _joint_states_list.at(1)->getId(), {offset_to_send, offset_to_send});
564  _stepper_bus_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
565  }
566  else if (motor_id == _joint_states_list.at(2)->getId())
567  {
568  offset_to_send = sensor_offset_steps - _joint_states_list.at(2)->to_motor_pos(_joint_states_list.at(2)->getLimitPositionMin());
569 
570  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION_OFFSET, _joint_states_list.at(2)->getId(), {offset_to_send, sensor_offset_steps});
571  _stepper_bus_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
572  }
573  }
574 
575  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
576  status = EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK;
577  _stepper_bus_interface->setCalibrationStatus(EStepperCalibrationStatus::OK);
578  }
579  } // if (state)
580  } // if (getMotorsCalibrationOffsets(motor_id_list, steps_list))
581 
582  return status;
583 }
584 
585 //**********************
586 // Commands to the robot
587 //*********************
588 
594 void CalibrationManager::setTorqueStepperMotor(const std::shared_ptr<JointState> &pState, uint8_t percentage)
595 {
596  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
597 
598  if (pState && pState->isStepper())
599  {
600  uint8_t motor_id = pState->getId();
601 
602  if (_can_interface && EBusProtocol::CAN == pState->getBusProtocol())
603  {
604  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, {percentage})));
605  }
606  else if (_ttl_interface && EBusProtocol::TTL == pState->getBusProtocol())
607  {
608  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(StepperTtlSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, motor_id, {percentage})));
609  }
610  }
611 }
612 
616 void CalibrationManager::initVelocityProfiles()
617 {
618  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
619 
620  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version)
621  {
622  for (auto param : _calibration_params_map)
623  {
624  // CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE cmd
625  StepperTtlSingleCmd cmd_profile(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE, param.first, param.second.profile.to_list());
626  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(cmd_profile));
627  }
628  }
629 
630  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
631 }
632 
636 void CalibrationManager::resetVelocityProfiles()
637 {
638  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
639 
640  if ("ned2" == _hardware_version)
641  {
642  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
643  {
644  if (jState && jState->isStepper() && EBusProtocol::TTL == jState->getBusProtocol())
645  {
646  auto stepperState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<StepperMotorState>(jState);
647  if (stepperState)
648  {
649  // CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE cmd
650  StepperTtlSingleCmd cmd_profile(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE, stepperState->getId(), stepperState->getVelocityProfile().to_list());
651  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(cmd_profile));
652  }
653  }
654  }
655 
656  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
657  }
658 }
659 
663 void CalibrationManager::moveRobotBeforeCalibration()
664 {
665  // 0. activate torque for all motors
666  activateTorque(true);
667 
668  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
669 
670  // 1. Relative Move Motor 2 (can only)
671  if (_can_interface && _joint_states_list.at(1)->isStepper() && common::model::EBusProtocol::CAN == _joint_states_list.at(1)->getBusProtocol())
672  {
673  uint8_t motor_id = _joint_states_list.at(1)->getId();
674  int steps = -500 * _joint_states_list.at(1)->getDirection();
675  int delay = 1000;
676 
677  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_RELATIVE_MOVE, motor_id, {steps, delay})));
678  }
679 
680  // 2. Relative Move Motor 3
681  if (_joint_states_list.at(2)->isStepper())
682  {
683  uint8_t motor_id = _joint_states_list.at(2)->getId();
684 
685  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == _joint_states_list.at(2)->getBusProtocol())
686  {
687  int steps = _joint_states_list.at(2)->to_motor_pos(0.25);
688  int delay = 1000;
689 
690  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_RELATIVE_MOVE, motor_id, {steps, delay})));
691  }
692  else if (EBusProtocol::TTL == _joint_states_list.at(2)->getBusProtocol())
693  {
694  auto steps = static_cast<uint32_t>(_joint_states_list.at(2)->getPosition() + 10 * _joint_states_list.at(2)->getDirection());
695 
696  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(StepperTtlSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION, motor_id, {steps})));
697  }
698  }
699 
700  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
701 
702  // 3. Move All Dynamixel to Home Position
703  if (_ttl_interface)
704  {
705  // set torque on
706  DxlSyncCmd dynamixel_cmd(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION);
707 
708  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
709  {
710  if (jState && jState->isDynamixel())
711  {
712  dynamixel_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), jState->getId(), static_cast<uint32_t>(jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getHomePosition())));
713  }
714  }
715 
716  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSyncCmd>(dynamixel_cmd));
717  }
718 
719  // Wait a little bit for all dxl go to home before calibration
720  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
721 }
722 
727 void CalibrationManager::moveSteppersToHome()
728 {
729  // 2. move all steppers to Home Position
730  StepperTtlSyncCmd stepper_ttl_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION);
731 
732  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
733  {
734  if (jState && jState->isStepper())
735  {
736  uint8_t motor_id = jState->getId();
737  int steps{0};
738 
739  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == jState->getBusProtocol())
740  {
741  // after calibration, joint 1 and 2 are at limit max but joint 3 is at limit min
742  if (motor_id != 3)
743  steps = jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getHomePosition()) - jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getLimitPositionMax());
744  else
745  steps = jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getHomePosition()) - jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getLimitPositionMin());
746 
747  int delay = (1 >= motor_id) ? 500 : 1700;
748  // TODO(cc) quick fix, we should use the same method for real and simulation.
749  // The difficulty here is that simulation does not move the joints during the calibration (how to do it ?)
750  if (!_simulation_mode)
751  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
752  std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_RELATIVE_MOVE, motor_id, {steps, delay})));
753  else
754  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
755  std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_POSITION, motor_id, {jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getHomePosition())})));
756  }
757  else if (EBusProtocol::TTL == jState->getBusProtocol())
758  {
759  steps = jState->to_motor_pos(jState->getHomePosition());
760  stepper_ttl_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), motor_id, static_cast<uint32_t>(steps));
761  }
762  }
763  }
764 
765  if (stepper_ttl_cmd.isValid())
766  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSyncCmd>(stepper_ttl_cmd));
767 }
768 
772 void CalibrationManager::sendCalibrationToSteppers()
773 {
774  // 2. for each stepper, configure and send calibration cmd
775  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
776  {
777  if (jState && jState->isStepper()) // only steppers can be calibrated
778  {
779  auto pStepperMotorState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<StepperMotorState>(jState);
780  if (pStepperMotorState && pStepperMotorState->isValid())
781  {
782  uint8_t id = pStepperMotorState->getId();
783  int8_t direction{};
784  uint8_t stall_threshold{};
785  int32_t delay{};
786 
787  if (_calibration_params_map.count(id))
788  {
789  stall_threshold = _calibration_params_map.at(id).stall_threshold;
790  direction = pStepperMotorState->getDirection() * _calibration_params_map.at(id).direction;
791  delay = _calibration_params_map.at(id).delay;
792  }
793 
794  if (_can_interface && EBusProtocol::CAN == pStepperMotorState->getBusProtocol())
795  {
796  int32_t offset;
797  // max limit in robot is correspond to the position initial of motor, with other motors
798  // min limit is correspond to the position initial
799  if (jState->getId() == 3)
800  offset = pStepperMotorState->to_motor_pos(pStepperMotorState->getLimitPositionMin());
801  else
802  offset = pStepperMotorState->to_motor_pos(pStepperMotorState->getLimitPositionMax());
803 
804  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
805  std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(StepperSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CALIBRATION, id, {offset, delay, direction, _calibration_timeout})));
806  }
807  else if (_ttl_interface && EBusProtocol::TTL == pStepperMotorState->getBusProtocol())
808  {
809  // for stepper TTL 0 is decreasing direction
810  uint8_t ttl_direction = (direction < 0) ? 0 : 1;
811 
812  // send config before calibrate
813  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
814  std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(StepperTtlSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CALIBRATION_SETUP, id, {ttl_direction, stall_threshold})));
815 
816  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(StepperTtlSingleCmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CALIBRATION, id)));
817  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::sendCalibrationToSteppers - %d", id);
818  }
819  }
820  }
821  }
822 
823  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
824 }
825 
830 void CalibrationManager::activateTorque(bool activated)
831 {
832  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
833 
834  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::activateTorque - activate learning mode");
835 
836  DxlSyncCmd dxl_cmd(EDxlCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE);
837  StepperTtlSyncCmd stepper_ttl_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE);
838 
839  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
840  {
841  if (jState)
842  {
843  if (jState->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::TTL)
844  {
845  if (jState->isDynamixel())
846  dxl_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), jState->getId(), activated);
847  else
848  stepper_ttl_cmd.addMotorParam(jState->getHardwareType(), jState->getId(), activated);
849  }
850  else
851  {
852  StepperSingleCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE);
853 
854  stepper_cmd.setId(jState->getId());
855  stepper_cmd.setParams({activated});
856  if (_can_interface)
857  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(stepper_cmd));
858  }
859  }
860  }
861 
862  if (_ttl_interface)
863  {
864  if (dxl_cmd.isValid())
865  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<DxlSyncCmd>(dxl_cmd));
866 
867  if (stepper_ttl_cmd.isValid())
868  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSyncCmd>(stepper_ttl_cmd));
869  }
870 }
871 
877 bool CalibrationManager::writeHomingAbsPosition()
878 {
879  if (_ttl_interface)
880  {
881  _ttl_interface->waitSingleQueueFree();
882 
883  // CMD_TYPE_READ_HOMING_ABS_POSITION cmd
884  StepperSyncCmd stepper_cmd(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_WRITE_HOMING_ABS_POSITION);
885 
886  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
887  {
888  if (jState && jState->isStepper())
889  {
890  auto state = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::StepperMotorState>(jState);
891  stepper_cmd.addMotorParam(state->getHardwareType(), state->getId(), static_cast<int32_t>(state->getHomingAbsPosition()));
892  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::writeHomingAbsPosition - id: %d, homing: %d", state->getId(), static_cast<int32_t>(state->getHomingAbsPosition()));
893  }
894  }
895 
896  _ttl_interface->addSyncCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSyncCmd>(stepper_cmd));
897 
898  // Wait for all stepper commands are executed
899  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
900  return true;
901  }
902  return false;
903 }
904 
910 bool CalibrationManager::readHomingAbsPosition()
911 {
912  _ttl_interface->waitSyncQueueFree();
913  return _ttl_interface->readHomingAbsPosition();
914 }

918 //********************
919 
926 bool CalibrationManager::saveCalibrationOffsetsToFile(const std::vector<int> &motor_id_list, const std::vector<int> &steps_list)
927 {
928  bool res = false;
929  if (motor_id_list.size() == steps_list.size())
930  {
931  size_t found = _calibration_file_name.find_last_of('/');
932  std::string folder_name = _calibration_file_name.substr(0, found);
933 
934  boost::filesystem::path filepath(_calibration_file_name);
935  boost::filesystem::path directory(folder_name);
936 
937  // Create dir if not exist
938  boost::system::error_code returned_error;
939  boost::filesystem::create_directories(directory, returned_error);
940 
941  if (!returned_error)
942  {
943  // Create text to write
944  std::string text_to_write;
945  for (size_t i = 0; i < motor_id_list.size(); i++)
946  {
947  text_to_write += std::to_string(motor_id_list.at(i));
948  text_to_write += ":";
949  text_to_write += std::to_string(steps_list.at(i));
950  if (i < motor_id_list.size() - 1)
951  {
952  text_to_write += "\n";
953  }
954  }
955 
956  // Write to file
957  std::ofstream offset_file(_calibration_file_name.c_str());
958  if (offset_file.is_open())
959  {
960  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::set_motors_calibration_offsets - Writing calibration offsets to file : \n%s", text_to_write.c_str());
961 
962  offset_file << text_to_write.c_str();
963  offset_file.close();
964 
965  res = true;
966  }
967  else
968  {
969  ROS_WARN("CalibrationManager::set_motors_calibration_offsets - Unable to open file : %s", _calibration_file_name.c_str());
970  }
971  }
972  else
973  {
974  ROS_WARN("CalibrationManager::set_motors_calibration_offsets - Could not create directory : %s", folder_name.c_str());
975  }
976  }
977  else
978  {
979  ROS_ERROR("CalibrationManager::set_motors_calibration_offsets - Corrupted command"
980  ": motors id list and params list size mismatch");
981  }
982 
983  return res;
984 }
985 
992 bool CalibrationManager::readCalibrationOffsetsFromFile(std::vector<int> &motor_id_list, std::vector<int> &steps_list)
993 {
994  bool res = false;
995 
996  std::vector<std::string> lines;
997  std::string current_line;
998 
999  motor_id_list.clear();
1000  steps_list.clear();
1001 
1002  std::ifstream offset_file(_calibration_file_name.c_str());
1003 
1004  if (offset_file.is_open())
1005  {
1006  // read all lines
1007  while (getline(offset_file, current_line))
1008  {
1009  try
1010  {
1011  size_t index = current_line.find(':');
1012  motor_id_list.emplace_back(stoi(current_line.substr(0, index)));
1013  steps_list.emplace_back(stoi(current_line.erase(0, index + 1)));
1014  }
1015  catch (...)
1016  {
1017  ROS_ERROR("CalibrationManager::getMotorsCalibrationOffsets - Exception caught during file reading");
1018  }
1019  }
1020 
1021  offset_file.close();
1022  res = true;
1023  }
1024  else
1025  {
1026  ROS_WARN("Motor Offset - Unable to open file : %s", _calibration_file_name.c_str());
1027  }
1028 
1029  return res;
1030 }
1031 
1037 bool CalibrationManager::saveHomingAbsPositionToFile()
1038 {
1039  bool res = false;
1040 
1041  size_t found = _homing_offset_file_name.find_last_of('/');
1042  std::string folder_name = _homing_offset_file_name.substr(0, found);
1043 
1044  boost::filesystem::path filepath(_homing_offset_file_name);
1045  boost::filesystem::path directory(folder_name);
1046 
1047  // Create dir if not exist
1048  boost::system::error_code returned_error;
1049  boost::filesystem::create_directories(directory, returned_error);
1050 
1051  if (!returned_error)
1052  {
1053  // Create text to write
1054  std::string text_to_write;
1055  for (const auto &jState : _joint_states_list)
1056  {
1057  if (jState && jState->isStepper())
1058  {
1059  auto state = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::StepperMotorState>(jState);
1060  text_to_write += std::to_string(state->getId());
1061  text_to_write += ":";
1062  text_to_write += std::to_string(state->getHomingAbsPosition());
1063  text_to_write += "\n";
1064  }
1065  }
1066  text_to_write.pop_back();
1067 
1068  // Write to file
1069  std::ofstream offset_file(_homing_offset_file_name.c_str());
1070  if (offset_file.is_open())
1071  {
1072  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::saveHomingAbsPositionToFile - Writing homing offset to file : \n%s", text_to_write.c_str());
1073 
1074  offset_file << text_to_write.c_str();
1075  offset_file.close();
1076 
1077  res = true;
1078  }
1079  else
1080  {
1081  ROS_WARN("CalibrationManager::saveHomingAbsPositionToFile - Unable to open file : %s", _calibration_file_name.c_str());
1082  }
1083  }
1084  else
1085  {
1086  ROS_WARN("CalibrationManager::saveHomingAbsPosition - Could not create directory : %s", folder_name.c_str());
1087  }
1088 
1089  return res;
1090 }
1091 
1097 bool CalibrationManager::readHomingAbsPositionFromFile()
1098 {
1099  bool res = false;
1100 
1101  std::string current_line;
1102 
1103  std::map<uint8_t, int32_t> id_homing_map;
1104 
1105  std::ifstream offset_file(_homing_offset_file_name.c_str());
1106 
1107  if (offset_file.is_open())
1108  {
1109  // read all lines
1110  while (getline(offset_file, current_line))
1111  {
1112  try
1113  {
1114  size_t index = current_line.find(':');
1115  uint8_t id = stoi(current_line.substr(0, index));
1116  int32_t homing_pos = stoi(current_line.erase(0, index + 1));
1117  id_homing_map[id] = homing_pos;
1118  ROS_DEBUG("read SD card values: id: %d, homing: %d", id, homing_pos);
1119  }
1120  catch (...)
1121  {
1122  ROS_ERROR("CalibrationManager::readHomingAbsPosition - Exception caught during file reading");
1123  }
1124  }
1125 
1126  if (id_homing_map.size() == _calibration_params_map.size())
1127  {
1128  for (auto const &jState : _joint_states_list)
1129  {
1130  if (jState && jState->isStepper())
1131  {
1132  auto state = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<common::model::StepperMotorState>(jState);
1133  state->setHomingAbsPosition(id_homing_map[state->getId()]);
1134  ROS_DEBUG("CalibrationManager::readHomingAbsPositionFromFile - id: %d, homing_pos: %u", state->getId(), state->getHomingAbsPosition());
1135  }
1136  }
1137  res = true;
1138  }
1139 
1140  offset_file.close();
1141  }
1142  else
1143  {
1144  ROS_WARN("Homing absolute position - Unable to open file : %s", _homing_offset_file_name.c_str());
1145  }
1146  return res;
1147 }
